#summary List of Papers about Guru

== 2010 ==

  * Resource Typing in Guru. Aaron Stump and Evan Austin. PLPV 2010. [[http://www.cs.uiowa.edu/~astump/papers/plpv10.pdf PDF], [http://www.cs.uiowa.edu/~astump/talks/plpv10.pdf slides]]


== 2009 ==

  * Verified Programming in Guru. Aaron Stump, Morgan Deters, Adam Petcher, Todd Schiller, and Timothy Simpson. Programming Languages meets Program Verification (PLPV), 2009. [[http://www.cs.uiowa.edu/~astump/papers/plpv09.pdf PDF]]. 

  * Deciding Joinability Modulo Ground Equations in Operational Type Theory. Adam Petcher and Aaron Stump. Proof Search in Type Theories (PSTT). [[http://www.cs.uiowa.edu/~astump/papers/hypjoin-pstt09.pdf PDF]]. 


== 2008 ==

  * Deciding Joinability Modulo Ground Equations in Operational Type Theory. Adam Petcher. Master's Thesis, Washington University in St. Louis, April 2008. [[http://www.cs.uiowa.edu/~astump/papers/petcher-thesis.pdf PDF]] 

  * A Core Operational Type Theory. Aaron Stump and Edwin Westbrook, 2008 [[http://www.cs.uiowa.edu/~astump/papers/optt.pdf PDF]]
